mapper.sql: id, project_id AS projectId, identifier, specification, device_no AS deviceNo, owner, manufactor, max_range AS maxRange, max_weight AS maxWeight, standard_height AS standardHeight, fix_moment AS fixMoment, wind_speed AS windSpeed, tilt_angle AS tiltAngle, comments, is_del AS isDel, create_time AS createTime, create_user AS createUser, modify_time AS modifyTime, modify_user AS modifyUser, org_id AS orgId, type, login_name AS loginName, password, ip_address AS ipAddress, port, platform_type AS platformType, tunnel
mapper.select: select GROUP_CONCAT(m.device_type) deviceStr,uuid from (select CONCAT('sjjht',':',device_no) device_type , (select uuid from t_project_info where id =t_project_lift.project_id ) uuid from t_project_lift where is_del = 0 UNION ALl select CONCAT('qzjht',':',device_no) device_type ,(select uuid from t_project_info where id =t_project_crane.project_id ) from t_project_crane where is_del = 0 UNION ALl select CONCAT('ycht',':',device_no) device_type ,(select uuid from t_project_info where id =t_project_environment_monitor.project_id ) from t_project_environment_monitor where is_del = 0 union ALL select concat('dbht',':',device_no) device_type ,(select uuid from t_project_info where id =t_project_electric_power.project_id ) from t_project_electric_power where is_del = 0 union ALL select concat('sbht',':',device_no) device_type ,(select uuid from t_project_info where id =t_project_water_meter.project_id ) from t_project_water_meter where is_del = 0 ) m GROUP BY uuid
mapper.update: update ${tableName} set is_online = ${status} where device_no = ${deviceNo} and is_del = 0
